alert.note: Alert for Ashe; Watauga (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 11:24AM EST until January 23 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina, southwest Virginia and southeast West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the potential for accumulating snow, expect windy conditions with temperatures falling into the 20s...and wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
